data.name: Going cross-border: Why Indian Startups should look to China and Southeast Asia
data.summary: In last few years Indian Startups have tremendously gained from resources of China and South Easy Asia. So far billions of dollars have been infused in India by investors from these regions. Not just the monetary resource, there are so many things Indian founders can expect from these ecosystems. The session will include all that we could expect from these regions.
data.speakers:
William Bao Bean, General Partner, SOSV
Karena Belin, Cofounder, AngelHub
